name: SpiritSphere
description: SpiritSphere is a local multiplayer game that draws inspiration from classics like Zelda and Windjammers and mashes it together with the nostalgic feel of playing air hockey at your local arcade.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: If your computer can make sound you're good
